name: B-Ball Dunk
description:
The basketball dunk game you've been waiting for! Try to score basketballs, watermelons and other crazy items while evading boomerangs, saw blades and many challenges.

If you think this is easy you are wrong, the hoops are moving, the ball launcher is moving, getting the timing right needs your mastery. If you miss the hoop one time it's over, so choose your strategy well!

This is super fun and addictive basketball game

Why B-Ball Dunk rules:
- Crazy items to dunk
- Cool challenges
- Timing skills like no other
- Simple yet rewarding
- Great time killer
